project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches and displays the current weather information for a given city using a public API.

task.name: Implement feature to fetch weather data from public API
Extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions from the fetched data
Implement feature to display weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the fetching, extracting, and display features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
